data.text: @NoahCRothman “We will all look different without our masks on and we will need to learn to read one another's expressions. We will also need to be tolerant as we  learn and share more about one another and what we all look like” - email from high school this am.

@NoahCRothman Listen, I know we’re in very serious times, but this must be said: on yesterday’s podcast John’s transition from Putin’s Covid fear into the X-Chair ad was a work of art. Please let him know that it did not go unnoticed.
@zanfr @NoahCRothman They can't deal with it. They prefer to remain delusional.
@NoahCRothman People know the pandemic isn't over, now grow up https://t.co/L8ygTURJ1T

@reluctantanp @NoahCRothman Agree 💯. Nevada dropped its mask mandate 2 weeks ago yet 50% of the people I see shopping indoors still wear them. They seem to believe it protects them better than their multiple vaccines.

@Jimmy_Stick @NoahCRothman They only interview these moderately crazy people. They don’t interview the people who still shelter in place and literally haven’t left their homes. Journalists know they sound insane.
@NoahCRothman "Everyone's parenting style but mine is wrong"
